EmailTemplate.subject: RESPOND HERE to Maintain Your Corian® Design Authorized Retailer Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Corian® Design greatly values your partnership! – PLEASE RESPOND ASAP
Your company is currently in our database as a Corian® Design Authorized Retailer and your confirmation is needed to maintain your current status. Without confirmation, we will remove you from our database, so please act quickly. By clicking the link below, you can review, update, and maintain your status in less than 2 minutes!
Please click here: http://dpscrm.force.com/BI_AuthorizationForm
Benefits of maintaining Corian® Design Authorized Retailer status:
*Receive our latest communications, with updates on new products, promotions, and more. *Placement on our online retailer locator. -Many homeowners research online before visiting a showroom. Your name, address, and location will be featured. *Qualified consumer leads. -Homeowners contacting Corian® Design directly will be given the closest Authorized Retailer information. *Social media tips to grow your business *Preferred access to local merchandising support. -Watch your email for updates!
Questions?
Please contact your local Corian® Design sales rep, or contact us at 1-800-906-7765.
Thank you for your business and your continued support of Corian® Solid Surface and Corian® Quartz!
